NAME: Name
APP_DESCRIPTION: Calculate the area of a piece of land using GPS.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The SurfaceGPS is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: In the list of pieces, click on the top right to create a piece, give it a name, then click on the top right to save it.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Click on the piece in the pieces list, click on 'Save' and move on the land's field. Once at the starting point, click 'Stop'.
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
QUESTION_START_RECORDING_AGAIN_OR_CONTIN: Recommencer l'enregistrement à zéro ou le poursuivre ?
QUESTION_CONFIRM_DELETE_PIECE: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this piece?
QUESTION_CONFIRM_DELETE_ALL_POSITIONS: Are you sure you want to delete all positions of this piece?
ALL_POSITIONS_ARE_DELETED: Toutes les positions ont été effacées
